column3: ACK fa7f5a4d2a2581cc25125311892a80efc2c494e2. Verified markdown view at https://github.com/MarcoFalke/bitcoin-core/blob/1911-docBips/doc/bips.md and the urls in the links. Some of the PRs are indicated with # and some without, but this is the case over the whole document.

Perhaps replace "It has been completely removed" with "It has been removed" (no need for "completely") or "Payment Protocol support has been removed".\n\nGiven the two sentences before use the present tense I was going to suggest the same ("Support is removed"), but saw that the verb tenses vary in this document between present tense and various forms of past tense.
nit: Unrelated, but "14451)), and" should be "14451)) and" (no comma) or "14451)), and it" (comma followed by an independant clause)
